entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:25 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:25 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:25 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023
